biotools.summary: TREND is a platform that allows researchers to explore protein function and evolution identifying protein features, gene neighborhoods and operons, clustering neighboring genes, and integrating all these data into phylogenomic context and cross-referencing with RefSeq, Pfam, CDD and MiST databases. The platform provides ample opportunities for adjusting each step of the analysis.

bioschemas.name: TREND Protein Evolution Function
